text: bristol-myers Squibb discovers develops
and delivers medicines innovative
medicines that help patients prevail
against very serious diseases we were
building data lakes in every different
manner possible and we were using all
kinds of different tools and different
methods and it created inconsistencies
it created higher run costs and a lot of
technical debt that was spread across
different platforms and technologies
when we moved to AWS we started with a
multi-tenant concept that allows us to
use services in a consistent way we're
also able to move toward an environment
that allows us to use serverless
technology so we moved away from 24 by 7
by 365 infrastructure and we're using
AWS glue that allows us to build out
scalable infrastructure that's used
on-demand pay-as-you-go which great gave
us a great advantage over what we were
doing before so we're able to ingest
data faster we're able to transform it
faster and it gives us faster insights
into where the medicine can be used
where the developments can happen in the
drug development process it really has
made some significant differences for us
organizationally it's allowed us to be
faster speed is a core tenant of what
we're trying to do at BMS the faster
that we can develop drugs the sooner
they can get to the patients who need
them
